QuestData.Title: The Path of the Invoker
QuestData.CompletionText: Dedication of this magnitude is a rarity. You have shown that your will is unfaltering, $N. You shall be greatly rewarded for your stalwart watch over our world.$b$bHand me your signet ring so that I may strengthen its enchantment.
QuestData.RewardText: Your rise amongst the rank of the Brood is most impressive, $n. May you never stray from the path of the invoker!
